name: Lightspeed Blazar
description: Take control of your very own spacecraft as you zoom through the void in an endless battle against an unknown alien threat! Clear waves of enemies while collecting valuable scrap materials to get to the end of each stage. Defeat the boss of each sector to gain access to new upgrades and move onto the next level. Spend scrap to upgrade your ship between sectors, unlock new awesome weapons, utility improvements and more to prepare for the dangers ahead as the enemies grow stronger each sector!
